sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import * as echarts from 'echarts'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', templateUrl: './dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dashboard.component.css'] }) export class DashboardComponent implements OnInit, { ngOnInit(): void { } ngAfterViewInit(): void { this.initECharts(); } initECharts(): void { const chartDom = document.getElementById('reportsChart')!; const myChart = echarts.init(chartDom); const option = { tooltip: { trigger: 'axis' }, legend: { data: ['Sales', 'Revenue', 'Customers'] }, toolbox: { feature: { saveAsImage: {} } }, grid: { left: '3%', right: '4%', bottom: '3%', containLabel: true }, xAxis: { type: 'category', boundaryGap: false, data: ["2018-09-19T00:00:00.000Z", "2018-09-19T01:30:00.000Z", "2018-09-19T02:30:00.000Z", "2018-09-19T03:30:00.000Z", "2018-09-19T04:30:00.000Z", "2018-09-19T05:30:00.000Z", "2018-09-19T06:30:00.000Z"] }, yAxis: { type: 'value' }, series: [ { name: 'Sales', type: 'line', stack: 'Total', data: [31, 40, 28, 51, 42, 82, 56] }, { name: 'Revenue', type: 'line', stack: 'Total', data: [11, 32, 45, 32, 34, 52, 41] }, { name: 'Customers', type: 'line', stack: 'Total', data: [15, 11, 32, 18, 9, 24, 11] } ] }; option && myChart.setOption(option); } }
